description:
Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaimetsu, Mugiwara Ichimi: Kagekage no Chikara Zenkai
L’équipage au chapeau de paille est anéanti. Le plein potentiel du fruit de l’ombre
The Straw Hat Crew Gets Wiped Out! The Shadow-Shadow`s Powers in Full Swing!
Команда Соломенной шляпы уничтожена – высшая сила фрукта Каге-каге
壊滅, 麦わら一味 カゲカゲの能力[ちから]全開
